channel.title: PAGASA VISPRSD Advisories
channel.description: Aggregated rainfall, thunderstorm, and special forecasts from PAGASA VISPRSD

item.title: Rainfall Advisory No. 2 #VISPRSD
item.description:
Heavy Rainfall Warning No. 2 #VISPRSD
Weather System: Low Pressure Area (LPA) / Southwest Monsoon (Habagat)
Issued at 11:00 PM 25 August 2025

Yellow Warning: #Cebu(SanFrancisco, Poro, Tudela, Pilar), #Leyte(Calubian, SanIsidro, Villaba, OrmocCity, Kananga, Leyte, MatagOb, Palompon, Merida, Isabel, Albuera, CityOfBaybay, Inopacan, Hindang, Hilongos, Bato, Matalom, Capoocan, Tabango), #SouthernLeyte(CityOfMaasin, TomasOppus, Bontoc, Sogod, Liloan, SanFrancisco, Macrohon, Malitbog, PadreBurgos, Limasawa, Libagon, Pintuyan, SanRicardo), #Samar(Almagro, CalbayogCity, CityOfCatbalogan, Daram, Gandara, Jiabong, Motiong, SanJoseDeBuan, SantaMargarita, SantoNi√±o, Tarangnan, Paranas, Zumarraga, TagapulAn, SanJorge, Pagsanghan), #OccidentalMindoro(AbraDeIlog, Looc, Mamburao, Paluan, Lubang) and #Biliran
Associated Hazard: FLOODING IS POSSIBLE in low-lying areas and LANDSLIDES in mountainous areas.

Meanwhile, Light to Moderate with occasionally Heavy rains are expected over #Palawan(Busuanga, SanVicente, Roxas, Taytay, Dumaran, ElNido, Linapacan and Araceli) within the next 2 to 3 hours.

The above conditions are being experienced in #Leyte(Burauen, Mahaplag, Abuyog, Javier, Macarthur, Mayorga, LaPaz, Dulag, Julita, Tabontabon, Tanauan, Tolosa, Dagami, Palo, SantaFe, Pastrana, Jaro, Carigara, Barugo, Tunga, Alangalang, SanMiguel, Babatngon, TaclobanCity), #Cebu(Bantayan, Madridejos, SantaFe, Daanbantayan, Medellin, SanRemigio, CityOfBogo, Tabogon, Tuburan, Borbon, Tabuelan, Sogod, Catmon, Carmen, DanaoCity, Asturias, Balamban, Compostela, Liloan, Consolacion, MandaueCity, LapuLapuCity, Cordova, CebuCity, CityOfTalisay, Minglanilla, ToledoCity, Pinamungajan, CityOfNaga, Aloguinsan, Barili, CityOfCarcar, SanFernando, Sibonga, Dumanjug, Ronda, Moalboal, Alcantara, Argao, Badian, Dalaguete, Alegria, Alcoy, Malabuyoc, Boljoon, Ginatilan, Oslob, Samboan, Santander), #Bohol, #Siquijor, #NegrosOriental, #NegrosOccidental, #SouthernLeyte(Hinunangan, Anahawan, SaintBernard, SanJuan, Hinundayan, Silago), #Samar(Basey, Calbiga, Hinabangan, Marabut, Matuguinao, Pinabacdao, SanSebastian, SantaRita, Talalora, Villareal), #EasternSamar, #Iloilo, #Capiz, #Aklan, #Antique, #Guimaras, #OccidentalMindoro(Calintaan, Magsaysay, Rizal, Sablayan, SanJose, SantaCruz), #Palawan(Magsaysay, Cuyo, Agutaya, Coron and Culion) which may persist within 2 to 3 hours and may affect nearby areas.

The public and the Disaster Risk Reduction and Management Offices concerned are advised to MONITOR the weather condition and watch for the next warning to be issued at 02:00 AM Tomorrow.

item.title: Rainfall Advisory No. 1 #VISPRSD
item.description:
Heavy Rainfall Warning No. 1 #VISPRSD
Weather System: Low Pressure Area (LPA) / Southwest Monsoon (Habagat)
Issued at 08:00 PM 25 August 2025

Yellow Warning: #Cebu(SanFrancisco, Poro, Tudela, Pilar), #Leyte(Tabango, Villaba, OrmocCity, Kananga, Leyte, MatagOb, Palompon, Merida, Isabel, Albuera, CityOfBaybay, Inopacan, Hindang, Hilongos, Bato, Matalom, Capoocan), #SouthernLeyte(CityOfMaasin, TomasOppus, Bontoc, Sogod, Liloan, SanFrancisco, Macrohon, Malitbog, PadreBurgos, Limasawa, Libagon, Pintuyan and SanRicardo)
Associated Hazard: FLOODING IS POSSIBLE in low-lying areas and LANDSLIDES in mountainous areas.

Meanwhile, Light to Moderate with occasionally Heavy rains are expected over #Palawan(Busuanga and Culion) within the next 2 to 3 hours.

The above conditions are being experienced in #Leyte(Calubian, SanIsidro, Burauen, Mahaplag, Abuyog, Javier, Macarthur, Mayorga, LaPaz, Dulag, Julita, Tabontabon, Tanauan, Tolosa, Dagami, Palo, SantaFe, Pastrana, Jaro, Carigara, Barugo, Tunga, Alangalang, SanMiguel, Babatngon, TaclobanCity), #Cebu(Bantayan, Madridejos, SantaFe, Daanbantayan, Medellin, SanRemigio, CityOfBogo, Tabogon, Tuburan, Borbon, Tabuelan, Sogod, Catmon, Carmen, DanaoCity, Asturias, Balamban, Compostela, Liloan, Consolacion, MandaueCity, LapuLapuCity, Cordova, CebuCity, CityOfTalisay, Minglanilla, ToledoCity, Pinamungajan, CityOfNaga, Aloguinsan, Barili, CityOfCarcar, SanFernando, Sibonga, Dumanjug, Ronda, Moalboal, Alcantara, Argao, Badian, Dalaguete, Alegria, Alcoy, Malabuyoc, Boljoon, Ginatilan, Oslob, Samboan, Santander), #Bohol, #Siquijor, #NegrosOriental, #NegrosOccidental, #SouthernLeyte(Hinunangan, Anahawan, SaintBernard, SanJuan, Hinundayan, Silago), #Biliran, #Samar, #EasternSamar, #Iloilo, #Capiz, #Aklan, #Antique, #Guimaras, #OccidentalMindoro, #Palawan(Magsaysay, Cuyo, Agutaya and Coron) which may persist within 2 to 3 hours and may affect nearby areas.

The public and the Disaster Risk Reduction and Management Offices concerned are advised to MONITOR the weather condition and watch for the next warning to be issued at 11:00 PM Today.

item.title: Thunderstorm Advisory No. 34 #VISPRSD
item.description:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 34 #VISPRSD
Issued at 11:40 PM 25 August 2025

Moderate to Heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over #Palawan(Culion, Coron, Busuanga, Roxas and SanVicente) within the next 30 minutes to an hour.

The above conditions are being experienced in #Palawan(Magsaysay, Agutaya, Cuyo, Araceli, Dumaran, Taytay, ElNido and Linapacan) which may persist within 1 to 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.

All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides. Keep monitoring for updates.

item.title: Thunderstorm Advisory No. 33 #VISPRSD
item.description:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 33 #VISPRSD
Issued at 10:01 PM 25 August 2025

Moderate to Heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are being experienced in #Palawan(Culion, Coron, Agutaya, PuertoPrincesaCity), #OccidentalMindoro(Lubang and Looc) which may persist within 1 to 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.

All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides. Keep monitoring for updates.

item.title: Thunderstorm Advisory #VISPRSD
item.description:
Thunderstorm Watch #VISPRSD
Issued at 10:00 PM 25 August 2025

Thunderstorm is MORE LIKELY to develop over #Cebu, #Bohol, #Siquijor, #NegrosOriental, #Antique, #OccidentalMindoro and #Palawan within 12 hours.

item.title: Thunderstorm Advisory No. 32 #VISPRSD
item.description:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 32 #VISPRSD
Issued at 09:15 PM 25 August 2025

Moderate to Heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are being experienced in #Palawan(Aborlan, Narra, SofronioEspanola, Brooke'sPoint, Quezon, Cagayancillo and Kalayaan) which may persist within 1 to 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.

All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides. Keep monitoring for updates.
